panels.description: It indicates Hight CPU Utilization if the CPU utilization crosses 90%  over an average of 5 minute period.
panels.title: CPU Load

panels.description: It indicates Low Memory if the Java Heap Space utilization crosses 90%  over an average of 5 minute period.
panels.title: Java Heap Memory

panels.description: The last minute's error flow rate reaching a significant percentage (10%) of the last minute's started flow rate indicates high flow error rates.
panels.title: Flow Error Rate

panels.description: Assuming we have received enough messages in the last minute (at least 3 per second) to make a decision,- we can flag up an error if 25% of the messages took significantly (at least 50%) longer than the average message process duration.
panels.title: Message Processing Latency

panels.description: This indicates when a network parameter update has been proposed that has not been accepted yet.
panels.title: Network Paramater Update

panels.description: It indicates if the node is not reachable.
panels.title: Node Status

panels.description: Total number of attachments in the node
panels.title: Attachment Count

panels.description: Total number of successful and errored flows
The size of the in-memory send queue in the state machine for messages waiting to be sent to Artemis
panels.title: Send Queue Size

panels.description: The number of flows waiting to be executed.
panels.title: Flow Waiting Queue Size

panels.description: Weight Based Transactions  Cache
panels.title: DBTransactionStorage

panels.description: The current size of the cache expressed as a percentage of the maximum
panels.title: DBTransactionStorage Cache Load

panels.description: Size Based Cache for Hibernate Session Factories
panels.title: Hibernate SessionFactory Cache

panels.description: The current size of the cache expressed as a percentage of the maximum
panels.title: Hibernate SessionFactory Cache Load

panels.description: The rate at which checkpointing events are happening.
panels.title: Checkpointing Rate

panels.description: One minute moving average of started and errored flows. Flow  rate measured at a five-minute basis
panels.title: Flow Rates

panels.description: Histogram showing the queue size at the point new flows are added
panels.title: Flow Waiting Queue Histogram

panels.description: The latency between receiving a P2P message and delivering it to the state machine.
panels.title: Receive Latency Histogram

panels.description: The latency when sending P2P messages, between send and send acknowledge by Artemis
panels.title: Send Latency Histogram

panels.description: A number of messages received per second.
panels.title: Received Messages Rate

panels.description: A number of messages sent per second.
panels.title: Send Message Rate
